interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Knight and Day (Single-Disc Edition)
Review Date: 2013/03/08
Store: Tom Cruise  (Actor),     Cameron Diaz  (Actor),     James Mangold  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, All Fox Titles
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Big screen superstars Tom Cruise and Cameron Diaz come together in this fun, action-packed thrill-ride that will keep you on the edge of your seat. When a small-town girl named June (Diaz) meets a mysterious stranger, she thinks she\'s found the man of her dreams. But she soon discovers he\'s a fugitive super-spy, who thrusts her into a thrilling cat-and-mouse chase that spans the globe. As the bullets and sparks fly, June must decide if her "Knight" in shining armor is a dangerous traitor or the love of her life.', 'Amazon.com', 'Knight and Day', 'has action by the boatload, cheeky wit, unexpected double-crossing, sexual tension, and the blinding smile of its star, Tom Cruise. In short, what more could you ask of a rollicking good-time movie?', 'Knight and Day', ", which also stars the irresistible Cameron Diaz as Cruise's superspy's ultimate foil, channels the best elements of earlier films like", 'Mr. and Mrs. Smith', ',', 'Mission: Impossible', ', the', 'Bourne', 'films, and even a little of', 'Duplicity', "'s sophistication. Mostly, though,", 'Knight and Day', 'is about moving things along merrily, if not completely coherently, as the two stars tangle, and tussle with trust issues, in a completely believable, compulsively watchable way. Cruise plays Roy, an on-the-lam spy (who may have had some kind of psychotic break--or who may in fact be the only person telling the truth); he runs into the winsome June (Diaz), who gets caught up in Roy\'s mad dash to escape the cabal of federal agents on his tail. "No one follows us," Roy announces to a terrified diner crowd as he moves to make his escape with June, "or I kill myself--and then her." While', 'Knight and Day', ', directed by James Mangold, has more than its share of high-speed chases, hails of bullets, and explosions, it works far better as a romantic comedy--for the chemistry between Diaz and Cruise is delicious, palpable, and believable. So grab a date and an extra-large popcorn, and get ready for a sweet and fun', 'Knight and Day', '. --', 'A.T. Hurley']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Action/Adventure', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC, AC-3, Subtitled, Widescreen, Dubbed', 'Contributor': 'Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, James Mangold', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 49 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.54 x 5.37 x 7.55 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FOXS2267223DVD', 'Director': 'James Mangold', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dolby, NTSC, AC-3, Subtitled, Widescreen, Dubbed', 'Run time': '1 hour and 49 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 30, 2010', 'Actors': 'Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: This one is a bit of a guilty pleasure. It definitely strains credibility ,but so do many fun action movies. It is like an amusement ride,it gives my brain a rest from stress, and makes me smile at the finish. It is a fun break as far as I am concerned. Though I am not a huge Tom Cruise fan(or Cameron Diaz - though I own on or two of their other movies), the chemistry is so good here , I enjoy it thoroughly.I worked in a video store for 10 years and have pretty eclectic tastes ,  this one  just goes under fun.
Review Title: Action packed fun.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Mr North
Anthony Edwards  (Actor),     Robert Mitchum  (Actor),     Danny Huston  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Science Fiction & Fantasy, Fantasy
['Product Description', "Anthony Edwards, Mary Stuart Masterson and Virginia Madsen star with a cast of luminaries, including Robert Mitchum, Harry Dean Stanton, Anjelica Huston, Tammy Grimes and Lauren Bacall, in this heartwarming and hilarious fable about a man who sets a wealthy community's hair on end literally! When young Yale graduate Theophilus North (Edwards) settles in Newport, Rhode Island, in 1926, he charms the elite with his ability to heal with an unusual energy that flows from his fingertips. But as North gains a reputation as a savior, he simultaneously endures the wrath of the local doctor, who labels him a charlatan. Suddenly this gifted newcomer must defend his honor before his unique talent sparks a backlash that lands him in jail!", 'Amazon.com', "T. Theopholis North (Anthony Edwards) is an aspiring adventurer making do as a tutor and reader to the upper-crust in 1920s Newport, Rhode Island, in Danny Huston's enchanting if rough-edged adaptation of Thornton Wilder's", 'comic novel', ". Equally at home with the rich (Robert Mitchum's blustery but big-hearted philosopher millionaire) and the poor (butler and all-around-town character Harry Dean Stanton), the young man with an electric personality (literally) becomes a liberator, a matchmaker, a reluctant faith healer, and a tonic for a community in the thrall of charlatans. Huston, son of the great John Huston (who helped script the film), is not a deft filmmaker, but he has a welcoming warmth and a contagious affection for his colorful characters. If his cast (which includes Lauren Bacall, Mary Stuart Masterson, and Anjelica Huston, Danny's sister) tends to overplay their parts, it's in the genial spirit of this lighthearted lark.", '--Sean Axmaker']

Ames, John Huston, Sandra Birnhak Ames', 'Studio': 'MGM (Video & DVD)', 'Writers': 'James Costigan, Janet Roach, John Huston, Thornton Wilder', 'Number of discs': '1'}
So glad we could find it here on DVD. It is packed with stars and gentle humor. It prompted us to read the book it is based upon, and we like the movie better in this case.It is not mainstream, but is treasured at our house!
We love this little movie!

I am fond of this one .The humor and spiritual perspective are right up my alley. It is not for everyone though.It pokes at organized religion.
Enjoyable quirky little movie

profile:
The user maintains a strong preference for classic and less mainstream movies, particularly in the science fiction and fantasy genres, and enjoys films that showcase ensemble casts with a blend of humor and heartwarming themes. Their appreciation for adaptations of literary works reflects a desire to explore original source material after viewing. Additionally, the user rates movies positively, favoring nostalgic and unique cinematic experiences over blockbuster hits.

Recent interactions reveal a burgeoning interest in films that possess a quirky and spiritual perspective, tackling complex themes such as critiques of organized religion. They are drawn to character-driven narratives that resonate with charm and richness, often infused with moral undertones. The user values deeper explorations of character dynamics and storytelling, seeking films that evoke thoughtfulness and enjoyment. 

The latest interaction indicates that the user enjoys light-hearted, action-packed comedies, viewing them as a form of escapism that provides a break from stress. They appreciate strong chemistry between actors and recognize that even if a film strains credibility, it can still deliver enjoyment. This blend of both thought-provoking and entertaining cinema highlights their diverse taste, encompassing both quirky narratives and fun, engaging films. Overall, the user continues to seek out cinematic experiences that balance humor with meaningful storytelling and broader social themes.
